text: Ranhou, a dan cong ta de zhu [an la] nali feng daole yixie [qidao de] yanci:[Ta lia shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women yi shi ziji shou sun. Jiaru ni bu kuanshu women, bu ci min women, women bi chengle sunshi zhe.”(Jian 7:23)] Yushi ta de zhu [an la] bian kuanshule ta [ji jieshou ta de huizui]. Ta [an la] que shi jieshou huiguo de, te ci de.
